# GKLeaderboard.LeaderboardType.classic

**Case**

A leaderboard that never expires, showing all-time rankings of all players.

## Declaration

```swift
case classic
```

## Constants

- **GKLeaderboard.LeaderboardType.recurring**: A leaderboard that recurs, allowing players a fresh start to compete and earn higher ranks in each ocurrence.

items.description: A leaderboard that recurs, allowing players a fresh start to compete and earn higher ranks in each ocurrence.
